dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.xpath
Class CurrentContext

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.xpath.CurrentContext

public class CurrentContext
extends java.lang.Object

This class wraps an JXPath context and provides a method to get a corresponding DCtxt. 

 public static Object MyTestXPathFunction( CurrentContext context, Object o ) {
     DCtxt ctxt = context.getDCtxt();
 }
